text: Wena (Muhammad) ungayeka othande ukumyeka kubo okanye uthathe lowo uthande ukumthatha. Nawuphi na kwabo (bafazi bakho) wahlukene okwethutyana nabo akuyi kubakho siphene kuwe ukuba uyamthatha kwakhona. Kokona kulungileyo oko okokuba babe nokwaneliseka ngoko ubanike kona bonke. Kwaye uAll√¢h Uyakwazi okusezintliziyweni zenu. Kananjalo nguSolwazi, nguMnini kunyamezela
